title: Dear Tanks: Please stop hiding behind me when I get fed.
body: This goes out to all the tanks out there, who see that carry when they get fed 5-0, 7-0, 8-1 etc. Can you please just engage for me and stop dancing behind me hoping that you don't go below full health? I cannot tell you how many games I lose because I get so strong that the enemy team knows all they have to do is focus me-- and then my tank decides that he's never going to engage them and just hide waiting for me to do something. Yes I can kill them, if you allow me time and protection. All I need is for you to be a distracting meat shield and let them HAVE to focus on you instead so that I can do a shitload of damage and win the fight. Yes you might die, but if you keep them on you long enough-- chances are we will win the fight because I'm getting to focus on their damage dealers. If you continue to hide behind me, then they are going to dive and focus me and even if they lose 2 people-- with the rest of the team not being fed you are going to lose us the game. PLEASE START ENGAGING, I am so sick of losing games because you play like a sissy and won't go in.

replies.body:
You know, there's a nice way and a wrong way to go about bringing up this issue.

I agree with the issue, but your delivery could be a little bit more polite.
Yuuup, if you try this in team chat(The phrasing I mean), you'll just have them get upset and it could put them on tilt. Not a good idea.

This is putting it nicely, no matter how many times I've tried to get people to just engage there is always some excuse as to why in the last 5 team fights the will not engage and hide behind me. What's not polite is people who play like this costing me promotions.

ayyy +1

seriously, as someone who never plays frontline champions this meta just destroys me because I get so bored waiting for someone to actually engage so i can fight.  

it's worst when I'm ADC... it's like, **please, we are ahead, assert our dominance before we get poked down to nothing**

But but they are not focusing me i cant tank them even with all the cc in my kit and i rather have you die than me dying with you!!!

Source: gameplay n balance challenjours

stay behind the tank.

if the tank doesn't feel up to it then maybe you shouldn't be fighting.

I do, but when they push outer turret, then mid turret, then move to inner turret and have yet to be engaged it's time to start getting concerned and stop hiding. It's not easy to be a carry when the tank is literally having a competition of who can run behind the furthest person.
